name: DIY Jiggly Japanese Cheesecake
description:
Have you ever seen a cake that jiggles? Well this new cake baking game will amaze you with another out of the box idea, a cheese cake that will jiggle with tap of your finger. Light and fluffy Japanese cheese cake that you won’t be able to resist watching every time they jiggle with the tap of your finger. This cotton cheese cake is so fluffy that you will keep on cuddling it and when you are going to take a bite, it will melt in your mouth leaving the sweetness of heaven. This amazing dessert will bring the cake baking and cooking games to another level with its light pillowy soft Japanese cheesecake. The recipe is so easy and easy to do that you will able to bake yours after playing this game once. Oh my God it jiggles with every single tap. I tried to make the most fluffy & jiggly cheesecake ever with this original cotton cheesecake recipe make yours today by downloading this new trendy cooking game.

Japanese Cheesecake Game Menu & features:
Make and play slime like Pandan Cake & Foam Cake
Jiggly Cheesecake with kids fun art on top made with sugar and chocolate powder.
Learn to use cake stencils for dusting.
Tap the fluffy cake to make it jiggle with amazing jiggling sound.
Learn real cooking recipe of soft Japanese cheesecake with this new kitchen cooking & cake making game.
Tons of delicious toppings and add-ons.
Complete your cake gallery and make all the cakes jiggle to vibrate your mobile.
The best dessert food maker game with some extra cooking fun.
